workshoptitle: Set up Highly Available and Secure Infrastructure with Terraform

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through how to set up Infrastructure as code using Terraform on OCI.

tutorials.title: Get Started
tutorials.description: This is the prerequisites for customers using Free Trial and Paid tenancies, and Always Free accounts (if applicable). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Set up your Tenancy
tutorials.description: Set up your Tenancy for Terraform

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Edit Terraform provider
tutorials.description: This Lab will enable Terraform to provision resources on your Tenancy

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Network Module
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through defining Networking resources needed for connectivity

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Bastion and Webserver Modules
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through defining Compute resources needed for a Bastion and 3 Web Servers

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Terraform Deployment
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through deploying your Terraform code

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
